name: antsama
text: I like that is enhances Lyle to make him MORE badass

name: hellofyellin
text: A comment left by hellofyellin was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by atom, pwb, mikejk305, perhapsmaybe, heatbag)

name: mulisha7
text: I don't know, as diseases go it's a shit-ton more fun than cancer.

name: hellofyellin
text:
It's the only disease you can get yelled at for having, though.

"Goddamnit, Lyle; you're an alchoholic!"

"Goddammit, Lyle; you have lupus!"

Chubb-a-dubb for the first one to catch that reference.

name: charchar
text:
Mitch Hedberg, stand-up special.

[i]"Y'see, one a' those does not sound right."

name: hellofyellin
text: Chubb-a-diddle, plus a v-chubb for the avatar.

name: woodenteeth
text: extra chub and a v-chub. discovered that excellent dead man only recently. holy crap what a genius.

name: hellofyellin
text: seriously, right?

name: woodenteeth
text: sincerely. that guy ruled so hard.

name: sheer
text: Welcome to New Jersey, where Talent Comes to Die.

name: jaldor
text: Yeah, it's a damn shame that he REALLY liked heroin.

name: woodenteeth
text: Yes. It's unfortunate he was punished for REALLY liking something. Punished by death. It seems somewhat unfair. I REALLY like Maltesers, but I can't imagine dying from it.

name: dusty
text: Pretty much everything you can really like can kill you; food, candy, drugs, sex, street racing. Then there's stuff like table top role playing and church, but is never truly living better than dying?

name: poodlelucy
text: i had never heard of him, just checked out some of his stand up. nice work. funny as hell delivery.

name: anzio
text: I miss Mitch with much gusto. Rest in peice, you silly, wonderful man.

name: mugi
text: Weird, I thought of this immediately after reading mulisha7's post as well.

name: mystkmanat
text: Then how come you drink so much at night?

name: qatipay
text: When Lyle was photographed, he was not holding a bottle at all.

name: overmedicated
text: I swear to god I have this curse. That or I'm just fat.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
see i think beef was just making up stuff about the curse, as it turns out soon after that it's actually the camera that was making him look fat

his low self esteem means that he always thinks he looks bad in pictures

name: theyang
text: hecho en Mexico, man.

name: terriblerobot
text: I have this curse as well. Maybe you and I could stand to lose a few pounds.

name: lizjones
text: Beef looks so protective of his cake in the second picture.

name: joeyramoney
text: he also seems to have sprouted a mustache.

name: area_homosexual
text: Those are fat creases aren't they? I recognize them from when I myself began to develop impressive-looking fissures down my cheeks as if I were finally sprouting a jaw line, but they turned out to be the impressions left by the steadily inflating pockets of fat reserves growing along both sides of my fuckin' face ('fuck's sake).

name: cousinted
text: He looks so angry in all but the third photo. I do not want to come between magical realism Beef and the buffet table.

name: all-star951
text: THIS NEEDS A CHUBBY

name: epicurus
text: everything about this strip is awesome. In that last panel, Beef DOES look like he has an opinion about one or more famous car drivers.

name: agika
text: Awww, fat Beef makes me sad.  Why, Kazenzakis curse, why?

name: deimosrising
text: Continuity error: Pat appears in one of these photos, but simply as Pat, not rock hard cat cock pat.

name: qatipay
text: Maybe because he's looking away from the camera? Does it only work if the subject realizes he's being photographed? Hmm.

name: phoenixultima
text: What's really neat is that Ray looks just the way he always does. That cat ain't got any illusions about himself.

name: zaratustra
text: Maybe Onstad only got the idea for the Mexican Realism thing -after- this comic? Nahhh.

name: jesler729
text: Yeah, Onstad has said that he makes up his arcs as he goes along, so this is probably the case.

name: jesler729
text: Why the lame? He... he said it in an interview! I'm just stating the facts!

name: spinynorman
text: A comment left by spinynorman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kenthegod, Epicurus, kochipoik)

name: tfaironpirate
text: YOU PREDICTED THE FUTURE!!!

name: epicurus
text: Thanks, I was wondering about that. The question is, what kind of thought process do you have to have to make up the idea of a camera that portrays certain people differently, then make a strip about it, while also having no explanation for it yet? That's some stone-cold Iron Balls right there.

name: nicolae
text: The Kazenzakis Curse is not to be confused with the curse of Hecho en Mexico Magical Realism.

name: catachresis
text: Oh god I am going through the archives and one of the best arcs is about to start DAMN I am all pumped

name: rmj12345
text:
Why is 2006 so damn heavy on the storylines and arcs ? And the daddy issues.

Not complaining! But I'm reading through the archives again and noting that spring/summer 2006 was unusually consistent in its rad-ness, all having cohesiveness.

name: william
text: Alt Text: The last photo is what Leonid Brezhnev looked like when it got way too hot at his building and he had to go up to the roof.

name: shownomercy
text: the glaring with the cake.. amazing!

name: tombsgrave
text: In my head Kazenzakis Curse Action Roast Beef makes these high-pitched grunts.  "Guuuuuh."  "Nerrrr." "Nrrrrouor?"  "Hrrrrg!"

name: heavymetaljesus
text: It goes from Wasted, to Apprehensive, to Jolly, to Pissed. Jolly is probably my favorite, right up there with Wasted.

name: nice_enuf_guy
text: Love it! Note too how short Vlad is in the last photo...perhaps machines also have neuroses? Good to see he grew his hair back!

name: soticoto
text: So how'd you know this wasn't before the hair-cut?

name: tellumo
text: I'm thinking he just reinstalled it.

name: tropicana
text: I've used this strip to explain to people why I hate having my picture taken.

name: endoftheworld
text: Yeah, the camera is a cruel master. I've all but forbidden friends and loved ones from using one of the accursed objects on me.

name: nokococo
text: Roast Beef and I are long lost twins.  Of different species.

name: jonmw
text:
what's the phrase...
brother of another mother?

name: jandruff
text: The camera also added an armpit stain on Beef.

name: beansdooma
text: Photo Beef is probably a Dale Jr. fan.

name: tbtabby
text: And he HATES Jeff Gordon.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: hates 'im to HELL.

name: aikennubbles
text: In the last picture Roast Beef has pitstains on his bare skin.  This curse is raw.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: The Camera has no mercy.

name: tagrineth
text: Every time your picture is taken, the camera steals a part of your soul

name: shinkicka
text: The last picture, paired with the alt text, wreck my shit every time. Bravo Onstad.

name: charchar
text: My family's curse is that we always look high in our photos.  Like instead of saying "No to drugs" we took a hit and said "Cheese!"

name: lawbot
text: The final shot kind of makes me think of Brezhnev.

name: numberkillinger
text: The alt-text makes me think of Brezhnev, and I don't even know who he is.

name: ritardomontabum
text:
In Soviet Union, Brezhnev knows you !
...
Sorry but I think its apropos.

name: goatmasterflash
text:
Chubbied, in part for the avatar and in spite of the fact that you really ought to have at least a small inkling of who Brezhnev is. Not even name recognition? Really?

I'm not gonna bother telling you about him, because I'm certain you know what google is. And also, what if I got it wrong...in public.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Man, I remember talking to a 17 year old when I was 25 who didn't even know what the Berlin Wall was, and she wasn't that stupid.

But she was pretty stupid.

name: highfeverblues
text:
[IMGS OFF]
Just sooooooo sexy.

name: jonmw
text: ...is there some kind of cartoon picture on that phone's dial?
